page.title: 06Clubs
page.content: One of Tayport's many clubs is Scotscraig{golf club,}it was founded in 1817.The golf course had 9 holes but was extended to 18 in september 2 1905. The total length of the course is 6486 yards.In 1984 the qualifying rounds of the Open was held at Scotscraig golf club There is an old established {Tennis {club}in Tayport which is just next to the new park.There's a player pavilion in Cupar road.The tennis courts have a practise wall as well.Thetennis courts were built before the war.{ { }Tayport Amateurs run three{football {teams}and are in three different leagues.There are four boys teams called Tayport Thistle.Each year there is a International tournament with teams from,France,Belgium,and Italy competing either here or abroad.
